### PipeFitterLowpass

[lib/streams.js:74-104](https://github.com/jason-weirather/js-seq-tools/blob/4e9d565567b8a2a2ee5f4cb688c6b7a4b27bcf4e/lib/streams.js#L74-L104 "Source code on GitHub")
